text:
Looking for a HubSpot developer or a full stack engineer with HubSpot experience for a medium term consulting engagement.

We have a MEAN stack site that we are transitioning to HubSpot CMS and need to build out a number of integration points, workflows, templates, etc.

Let me know if there is any interest.
Hey <@UQ22GG5FA>  <https://makewebbetter.com> have team of HubSpot experts to hire on request
